issue.title: [JS] Update dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12308](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12308). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have a lot of outdated dependencies. Some we may be able to remove but others should at least be updated.
